messages.content: You are a TypeScript expert. Convert Google Doc content to BlogPreview objects. Return only valid JSON.

Convert this Google Doc content to a BlogPreview object:

{{$json.content}}

Requirements:
- Extract title, slug, date, excerpt
- Generate URL-friendly slug from title
- Format date as YYYY-MM-DD
- Create compelling excerpt (max 200 chars)
- Extract relevant tags
- Return ONLY the JSON object

Structure:
{
  slug: string,
  title: string,
  date: string,
  excerpt: string,
  image?: string,
  tags?: string[]
}
